self_target_bientity_condition.description: If set, this condition must be met with the power holder as the actor and the initial attack target as the target to apply damage to nearby entities.
self_target_bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If set, this condition must be met with the power holder as the actor and the initial attack target as the target to apply damage to nearby entities.

self_nearby_bientity_condition.description: If set, this condition must be met with the power holder as the actor and an entity that should be damaged by this power as the target to apply damage to that entity.
